pages.title: Rose Gold
pages.text: Mining Level: Stone (1) $(br2)Mining Speed: 12 $(br2)Base Durability: 56 $(br2)Durability Multiplier: 1 $(br2)Attack Damage: +1

pages.title: Traits
pages.text: $(7)Magnetic I: $()$(br)Holding the tool pulls nearby items. $(br2)$(4)Corroding: $()$(br)The tool loses a small amount of durability with each repair.
